name: Legistify
long_description:
Legistify provides a comprehensive software to simplify legal operations for enterprises. We are building in India and chasing a $36 Bn+ global opportunity. â€¨We are already working with over 150 global enterprises. one_liner: Software designed to simplify  legal operations for enterprises.
